favourite.article: I agree with the prayer of this song, except I keep thinking the line that says "And never let Thy love forsake me" should read instead "And never let me, Lord, forsake Thee", because He said nothing can separate us from His love (Rom.835-39), and He will never fail or forsake us (Heb.13:5, and other verses).
Oh Lord I pray, let the words in this hymn be my daily experience. Do more of Your beating work, Your breaking work, Your shaping work, Your molding work in me. Amen.
